product_name: Teva Freewheel Suede Shoes - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: When your day involves hoofing it around town as well as pedaling down to the park, the women's Teva Freewheel Suede Shoes are up to the job thanks to their casual style and pedal-friendly tread. Suede leather uppers provide flexible, durable comfort; mesh linings move moisture away from skin for continual comfort. EVA midsole provides all-day comfort and support. Nonmarking Spider365 rubber outsoles include PedalLink tread designed specifically to provide extra grip on bike pedals. Closeout.
short_description: When your day involves hoofing it around town as well as pedaling down to the park, the women's Teva Freewheel Suede Shoes are up to the job thanks to their casual style and pedal-friendly tread.
